name: Bitball
description:
This is a singleplayer or multiplayer platformer type game. You hit the ball around trying to score on your opponent. 

Every time someone scores 3 walls are created at random areas of the map. When you hit a wall with the ball, the ball destroys it. There can be a maximum of 5 walls in the map at a time.

CONTROLS:

W and S or up and down arrows to move through the menu

Enter to select

Player 1:

jump: W/space

right: A

left: D

Player2:

jump: up arrow

right: right arrow

left: left arrow

This game was made for the lowrezjam 2019 and was made in one week.

The second file (Bitball2) is the same game, but the AI is slower!
